resources.string: Android offer two keys to leave apps, BACK for finish and return previous app, HOME for move background and open Launcher; and Android allow some apps to use service, which keeps running. Of course, you can swipe away from recent tasks list anytime.\n\nBrevent distinguish whether apps were started or finished, then brevent not-in-use apps from running long time. And force stop apps awaken by other apps.

Brevent love Android\'s design. When BACK to finish apps, apps and service won\'t be running; when HOME to background apps, apps and service can keep running in some time (You can modify in Brevent\'s Settings); when swipe from recent tasks list, apps are not needed anymore. Brevent shows running time for the apps are not finished.
When you turn on the device, Brevent requires you to run a command in debugging mode to acquire required permissions.
"Some similar apps require ROOT or modify unlocked devices. The debugging mode doesn't require ROOT, nor unlock, it's safe to use. "
Brevent requires Brevent server to be launched in debugging mode. However, debugging mode is not safe, it\'s recommended to turn off after Brevent server is running.
Brevent use many Android\'s hide API. Some third-party ROM may modify these API, so there are possible risks to use Brevent.
Enjoy Brevent, and feel free to feedback.

The default Brevent method is Standby. If you find some apps still running, please use Brevent or other tools to check whether it's Standby.

And to reduce self battery usage, Brevent sever delay the processes by 3 to 60 seconds according the event level.

When you clear apps from recent tasks, Android will kill the processes, and Brevent will force-stop them.

1. Turn on "Developer options", enable "USB debugging" %1$s

2. Connect to PC via USB

3. Execute in PC's command line: %2$s (Copied to clipboard)
Update Brevent list when apps installed or uninstalled
Some apps move to background when BACK is pressed. When on, Brevent process it like normal BACK (Available since Android 7.0)
Some apps open Launcher when BACK is pressed. When on, Brevent process it like normal BACK. Brevent could distinguish in most case, however you can press HOME 7 times to help Brevent confirm
After %1$s of inactivity with background apps
Recommend OFF. Sync and Alarms won\'t be available, apply even when you uninstall Brevent (Since Android 7.0)
Thanks for donation %d USD in Play Store
Thanks for donation %1$d times total %2$d USD in Play Store
Include system and framework apps cannot be open
All apps have the same signature with framework
Thanks for feedback.\n\nIf you have a GitHub account, please create an issue; you can view opened issues too.%s
\n\nFor private messages, please drop an Email to me.
